sentences.sContent: Photo Tip: When shooting in cold weather, or extreme conditions such as snow and sleet, it's important not to change your lenses outdoors.
sentences.sContent_eng: Photo Tip: When shooting in cold weather, or extreme conditions such as snow and sleet, it's important not to change your lenses outdoors.
sentences.sCn: 拍照小技巧：在寒冷的天气里，或者遇到极端天气的时候，如下雪或者雨夹雪，想要拍照，最重要的是注意不要在户外更换镜头。

sentences.sContent: The three boys threw their hockey gear to the top of the hill and tried crawling up the path, but the sleet had created a smooth glacier with nothing to hold on to.
sentences.sContent_eng: The three boys threw their hockey gear to the top of the hill and tried crawling up the path, but the sleet had created a smooth glacier with nothing to hold on to.
sentences.sCn: 三个男孩儿把他们的冰球装备扔到山顶上，然后试着沿小路往上爬，但雨夹雪已经令山坡变得更加的滑，而且没有任何可以抓住的东西。

trans.tranOther: half-frozen rain that falls when it is very cold
